President Wolfman

Ano: 2012

IMDb ID: tt2271412

Classificação: 4.9

Sinopse: Hail to the teeth. The President of the United States has been bitten by a werewolf and is loose on the streets of Washington on a killing rampage. Meet John Wolfman- politician, single father and suspect in a series of grisly murders around the capitol. Throw in Smokey the Bear, a mad scientist, and the Miss Teen beauty pageant and this Wolfman's got his hairy hands full. A comedy/horror/political satire and 'green movie' made entirely out of recycled stock footage, grainy government shorts, classroom education films, vintage stag reels and funky public domain features. From the creators of Pervert. and Sex Galaxy.—FilmFan
